string.value: #b#p9270058##k and her daddy were both surprised to see that most of the guests had brought their kids with them to the birthday party. There are no gift prepared for little kids, but #b#p9270058##k doesn't want to send them home with an empty hand. She must think of something very quickly.

Since all adults guests had received #b#t4000470##k as a gift, #b#t4000474##k would be just perfect for little guests. Now it's a matter of time. Enough #b#t4000474##k must be brought back to #b#p9270058##k before the party is over. 

#o9420536# #r#a45551##k 
#t4000474# #r#c4000474#/100#k

Just before the party was over, all kids at the party received surprised gift and was overjoyed. Though #b#p9270058##k had to rush into preparing gifts for those unexpected guests, afterall, more the marrier.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 18,000 Able to proceed to 'Grand Finale' as next quest.

As the birthday party started, both my daddy and I were surprised to see that most of the guests had brought their kids with them. I mean, it's not that we don't love them, but it's just that there's no gift prepared for them.

Even though they're unexpected guests, I don't want them to go home with empty hands. Oh! I know just what would be the perfect gift for them: #b#t4000474##k! It would look so cute! But could I get enough of them before the party is over?
Could you please hunt #b100 #o9420536##k and bring back #b100 #t4000474##k for me before the party ends?
You are a lifesaver. But you must hurry! The party won't last forever!
Oh no... Nothing is more depressing than those sad looks on the little kids' faces...
Wow! Just in time! The kids will be so excited to receive a surprise gift!
Could we make it on time? Please hurry!
